author: pstylez78
content:
Hi everyone here is my 2nd Dev Update better late than never lol! 
https://hackmd.io/@Rs7-mZniS1WXLPIkTdk4Mg/SJ1vkU1Ii
I've spent the last few weeks working to sift through and understand the ethereum-consensus spec and mev-rs to work towards finishing signature verification for mev-rs. I plan to build out mev-rs as my project for the EPF. Huge thank you to <@539495253418180618> for his patience with my many questions!
